title: Exploring the Relationship between Color & Distance
content: You will now explore the different galaxies in this image by using a plot of color vs distance. On this plot, smaller flux ratio numbers are redder colors. Let’s think about how this happens. Recall from the Hubble-Lemaitre Law that the Universe is expanding, and this expansion causes light waves to appear to be stretched to longer wavelengths. This is called cosmological redshift.
